sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROLPAH a town of Northern Hindustan, and capital of a district of the same name, in the province of Nepaul. It is a woody country, governed by a chief, who pays an annual tribute to the rajah of Nepaul. Long. 82. 5. E. Lat. 29. 22. N.
